data.expected_result: The "Invite" button next to users should be disabled, as the Share Link button is below the "never expire" toggle.
data.short_description: Trying to send an invite link through the invite screen crashes when you are being rate limited.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a server where you can create invites. - Open that server. - Tap "Invite Members" - Repeatedly toggle the "Set this link to never expire" switch until it says "You are being rate limited" - Tap the green "Invite" button next to someone's name
